languages.text: {n}Палач отвечает не сразу. Далеко не сразу.{/n} "Его преступление тяжелее любого другого, что видел этот помост. Ему была дарована новая судьба... и он отвернулся от нее. Отказался от величайшего дара для верных сынов и дочерей Тассеры!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Палач отвечает не сразу. Далеко не сразу.{/n} "Подопытные засыпали. Он изучал их... сновидения. Обрывки воспоминаний. Но шли годы, и писарем овладевало безумие. Тела его подопытных пропадали. Он будто бы... пожирал их, дабы изучить получше".
traits.speaker: FW_Lawman

languages.text: {n}The executioner does not answer right away, but makes you wait for a moment.{/n} "His crime is more grievous than any this scaffold has ever seen. He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift that can be offered to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"
languages.original_text: {n}Палач отвечает не сразу. Далеко не сразу.{/n} "Его преступление тяжелее любого другого, что видел этот помост. Ему была дарована новая судьба... и он отвернулся от нее. Отказался от величайшего дара для верных сынов и дочерей Тассеры!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The executioner does not answer right away, but makes you wait for a moment.{/n} "His crime is more grievous than any this scaffold has seen. He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

{n}The executioner doesn't answer right away. In fact, he makes you wait for a while.{/n} "His transgression is more grievous than any for which those who came here before had been condemned. He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift that can be offered to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift that can be offered to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift that can be offered to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

{n}The executioner does not answer right away, but makes you wait for a moment.{/n} "His crime is more grievous than any this scaffold has seen. He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

languages.text: {n}刽子手并没有立刻回答，而是等了一会儿。{/n}“他的罪行，比这件刑具处死过的所有人犯下的恶行都更严重。他明明已经得到了新的命运，可他却拒绝接受。他拒绝了塔瑟拉所有忠诚儿女最珍贵的礼物！”
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner does not answer right away, but makes you wait for a moment.{/n} "His crime is more grievous than any this scaffold has ever seen. He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift that can be offered to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}刽子手并没有立刻回答，而是等了一会儿。{/n}“他的罪行，比这件刑具处死过的所有人犯下的恶行都更严重。他明明已经得到了新的命运，可他却拒绝接受。他拒绝了塔瑟拉所有忠诚儿女最珍贵的礼物！”

languages.text: {n}El verdugo no responde enseguida, sino que te hace esperar durante un instante.{/n} «Su crimen es mucho más grave que cualquiera de había visto este cadalso hasta la fecha. Le fue concedido un nuevo destino, y sin embargo optó por renunciar a él. ¡Rechazó el don más valioso ofrecido a los leales hijos e hijas de Thassera!».
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner does not answer right away, but makes you wait for a moment.{/n} "His crime is more grievous than any this scaffold has ever seen. He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift that can be offered to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El verdugo no responde enseguida, sino que te hace esperar durante un instante.{/n} «Su crimen es mucho más grave que cualquiera de había visto este cadalso hasta la fecha. Le fue concedido un nuevo destino, y sin embargo optó por renunciar a él. ¡Rechazó el don más valioso ofrecido a los leales hijos e hijas de Thassera!».

languages.text: {n}Cellat hemen cevap vermiyor, biraz bekliyor.{/n} "Suçu, bu darağacına daha önce çıkanların her birinkinden daha ağırdır. Ona yeni bir kader bahşedildi, o ise buna meydan okumayı seçti. Thassera'nın sadık oğulları ve kızlarına verilebilecek en büyük hediyeyi geri çevirdi!"
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner does not answer right away, but makes you wait for a moment.{/n} "His crime is more grievous than any this scaffold has ever seen. He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift that can be offered to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cellat hemen cevap vermiyor, biraz bekliyor.{/n} "Suçu, bu darağacına daha önce çıkanların her birinkinden daha ağırdır. Ona yeni bir kader bahşedildi, o ise buna meydan okumayı seçti. Thassera'nın sadık oğulları ve kızlarına verilebilecek en büyük hediyeyi geri çevirdi!"

languages.text: {n}処刑人は、すぐには答えず、少し待たせる。{/n}「この者の罪は、先ほどやってきた者のいずれの罪よりも重大なものです。彼は新たな運命を与えられたにもかかわらず、それを拒否することを選んだのです。彼は、タッセーラの忠実なる子どもたちに送られた贈り物を拒んだのです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner does not answer right away, but makes you wait for a moment.{/n} "His crime is more grievous than any this scaffold has ever seen. He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift that can be offered to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}処刑人は、すぐには答えず、少し待たせる。{/n}「この者の罪は、先ほどやってきた者のいずれの罪よりも重大なものです。彼は新たな運命を与えられたにもかかわらず、それを拒否することを選んだのです。彼は、タッセーラの忠実なる子どもたちに送られた贈り物を拒んだのです！」

languages.text: {n}Le bourreau prend le temps de la réflexion avant de vous répondre.{/n} « Son crime est bien plus grave que tous ceux qu'a pu voir cet échafaud. Il s'est vu offrir une nouvelle destinée, mais il a choisi de n'en rien faire. Il a refusé le plus beau cadeau qui puisse être offert aux loyaux fils et filles de Thassera ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner does not answer right away, but makes you wait for a moment.{/n} "His crime is more grievous than any this scaffold has ever seen. He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift that can be offered to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le bourreau prend le temps de la réflexion avant de vous répondre.{/n} « Son crime est bien plus grave que tous ceux qu'a pu voir cet échafaud. Il s'est vu offrir une nouvelle destinée, mais il a choisi de n'en rien faire. Il a refusé le plus beau cadeau qui puisse être offert aux loyaux fils et filles de Thassera ! »

languages.text: {n}Der Henker antwortet nicht sofort, sondern lässt dich einen Augenblick warten.{/n} "Sein Verbrechen ist schwerer als alle, die dieses Schafott je gesehen hat. Ihm wurde ein neues Schicksal gewährt, doch er hat es nicht angenommen. Er hat das größte Geschenk an die treuen Söhne und Töchter Thasseras verschmäht!"
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner does not answer right away, but makes you wait for a moment.{/n} "His crime is more grievous than any this scaffold has ever seen. He was granted a new destiny, but chose to defy it. He turned away the greatest gift that can be offered to the loyal sons and daughters of Thassera!"

Ihm wurde ein neues Schicksal gewährt, doch er hat es nicht angenommen. Er hat das größte Geschenk an die treuen Söhne und Töchter Thasseras verschmäht!"
